The material is wrinkled...but it is the type that I think is supposed to have a wrinkled appearance. The underskirt was too short to be useful to me. It falls to my ankles.

Nice flowy dress. I live in very hot weather and this has nice breezy non-clingy material. Only issue was the elastic holding the buttons in place caused a lot of gaps. The buttons are not for function so I was able to sew that area down and everything was great after that.

Love this flowey summer dress.  I'm 5'5, 130lb and the small fits great. There was a white tassel attached  but I removed it as thought the white tassel didn't look right with an ivory dress.  I would give this dress a 5 star if it had pockets :-). Recommend.

I have several of these dresses. I leave the bottom buttons undone and put a pair of leggings underneath. I’ve worn them with sandals, cute sneakers, and high boots. Light weight enough to wear in the warm months without roasting. The sizing can run a little small….sometimes. Ones I ordered a couple years ago are smaller than the ones I just bought despite buying the same size. They hold up well in the wash but sometimes the length will shrink a bit. Just bought two. They were the exact same size until I washed them. Now one is about an inch and a half shorter. Didn’t shrink anywhere else. If you’re large chested, be aware that it might gap a bit at the buttons but there’s a little strip of fabric so it’s not see-through.

评论概述: Love it but BEWARE---length for this dress varies dramatically!
评论详情: Purchased this dress in a small.  I am 5'2" and 130 pounds.  Looked fabulous and ordered in another color.  Was 8 inches longer!  Contacted seller.....there is variation in sizing.  They are aware of the problem.  BUT if you are taller and it is not an issue, this is one of my favorite dresses. Rayon is pretty airy and it was cool even on vacation in 95 degree heat.  Very flowy and the neckline wasn't too low (when you are shorter, a normal neckline can plummet).  I have been washing in machine on delicate and hang dry and it is holding up beautifully.  Look for Rayon dresses on Amazon and they are a smidge higher in quality (IMHO)
I am in love with this dress. I am 5 feet. Dress is really comfy and fabric was good. Too.

评论概述: Pretty, but concerned about the wrinkling for travel
评论详情: First, the dress is pretty and not too sheer; very lightweight and flowy.  Happy that the background color is more of a warm light cream than white.  Originally ordered a Medium per the size chart but it was a bit snug; the Large is a better fit.  I'm 5'5" and didn't expect the dress to be as long as it is (almost to my ankles) on me; I may have it hemmed to be more mid-calf or slightly below the knee.  Had planned to wear it to a tropical/sub-tropical destination wedding but am concerned about how wrinkled it was in the packaging and whether or not it will travel well.  Nice for the price, hope to make it work for me.

The photos aren’t lying! I ordered an XL (my usual size), and it fits beautifully! It’s exactly what I thought I ordered and what I expected when I received it. It doesn’t accentuate my mid-section, which is where the XL comes from. Even better - the buttons are sewed shut, so there’s no need to worry about gaps in the dress or something showing that shouldn’t! You can bend or move freely with no slips. There are no pockets, but I feel like that’s what helps with the body-shape and makes it so flattering. The color is absolutely true. I wished I had found this dress years ago!!

评论概述: Good Fit For Curvy Big Girls
评论详情: I’m 5”4’ and 264 lbs. I was really skeptical about purchasing another dress on Amazon made for plus size girls because I usually feel like I’m wearing a big cloth or bag over my body. However, this dress gets an A grading because it actually accentuates my curves and fits nicely. It doesn’t hug any areas too tightly and has a nice flow. I would give it an A+ (five star rating) if the cut of the shoulders and chest area were more in a v-shape like the model, and if the belt area sat exactly at my waistline. I have an hourglass body type, so my waist sits a lower than the belt, yet it’s hard to tell and still fits lovely (I just won’t be able to accessorize the dress with a belt). I think the dress would also look better on me if I had bigger boobs (I’m a 34B), but there’s nothing I can do about that 😄. Overall, beautiful flower-designed dress made of decent material - it’s not paper thin, has an underskirt and does not feel scratchy against my skin. At my height and weight, the dress stops at my ankles and has a split in the front that is approximately the length of my legs. I hope more dresses similar to this can be made with more designs, but floor-length and without splits.

The first wear was amazing but after one wash I couldn't even wear it due to the bust size.  The stretchy elastic part when all the way over the cup. I washed in cold/gentle and air dried. I'm shocked by the shrinkage.

评论概述: Easy to wear - and I hope easy to clean
评论详情: I tried 3 dresses and this is the one I kept. It’s not transparent but I am happy that there’s an attached half-slip beneath. It packs well for travel and is easy to remove wrinkles (shower steam!) Made of 100% rayon, wash instructions say dry clean, but I will handwash it in comd water and hang dry. It is comfortable and I love that it has sleeves. I removed the unnecessary little white cord bowtie at the front of the waist; it looks classier without it. I get compliments on this dress!

The dress was a little big on me. I did not quite understand the sizing chart so I went with a Small. I am 5'4" 34C about 145. The dress is long, but I wanted it to hit longer to wear heels so that was fine. It has an elastic 2" or so band at the waist...it was loose on me, and I did not care for the white tie string that is attached to it; it was just there for looks, but not functional. There is a lining inside the dress but it is kind of short, just about enough to cover your important parts. I also read reviews that the dress unbuttons all the way down, but it has an area in the middle of the dress that does not unbutton. The top and toward the bottom both unbutton. It just was not for me...sadly returned it and am still on the hunt to find a dress to wear for a wedding. Hope this helps someone.
